title: Morning Joe 4/20/21
description: After three weeks of witness and expert testimony, the prosecution and the defense in the murder trial of Derek Chauvin have rested their cases and given closing arguments. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
